{"id":473833035,"lang":"rust","time":"3 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1617018232,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/473833035/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Array Equal","memory":"2.3 MB","code":"impl Solution {\n    pub fn min_operations(n: i32) -> i32 {\n        let mut ret;\n        if n % 2 == 0{\n            ret = (n / 2) * (n / 2);\n        }\n        else{\n            let m = (n - 1) / 2;\n            ret = m * (m + 1);\n        }\n        ret\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-array-equal"}
